name: Reincarnate Unveil Mail
text:
(This card is always treated as an "Armored Xyz" card.)
An Xyz Monster equipped with this card gains these effects.
● Cannot be destroyed by battle.
● Once per turn, if this card battled this turn (Quick Effect): You can return 1 Equip Card equipped to this card to the hand, then, immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 WATER Xyz Monster.
Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card is in your GY because it was sent there this turn: You can equip it to an Xyz Monster you control. You can only activate 1 "Reincarnate Unveil Mail" per turn.
